script: fetch('gallery.json').then(res => res.json()).then(images => { const gallery = document.querySelector('.gallery'); images.forEach(file => { const item = document.createElement('div'); item.className = 'item'; const img = document.createElement('img'); img.src = `images/gallery/${file}`; img.alt = file; const overlay = document.createElement('div'); overlay.className = 'overlay'; overlay.textContent = file.split('.')[0].toUpperCase(); img.onload = () => { const ratio = img.naturalWidth / img.naturalHeight; if (ratio > 1.2) item.classList.add('landscape'); else if (ratio < 0.8) item.classList.add('portrait'); else item.classList.add('square'); }; item.appendChild(img); item.appendChild(overlay); gallery.appendChild(item); }); setInterval(shuffleLikeCards, 5000); });
